State.Author: Maelstrom
State.Description:
Multiple stage project of mine that involves taking common 'tweaks' in DD:DA, recreating them while also providing streamlined installation instructions and merge-friendly structures in an effort to make modding easier.



This will cover Carry Weight. See Description.
State.Name: Maelstrom's MME Series 2 - Carry Weight

State.Author: maxfriend23
State.Description: Enhance greatsword skills, movements. Invisible shields will make your equiped shield invisible.
State.Name: Greatsword MAX

State.Author: Rudy102
State.Description: Preset for the latest ENB libraries, providing good performance and, of course, stunning visuals :)
State.Name: Rudy ENB for DDDA

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: BonusJZ
State.Description: No Cliping Cloaks project

Original.Name: Full Compilation for Male and Female NMM-5-1-41.rar

State.Author: Akalor
State.Description:
Makes some Items blacker so Assassin Characters have actually some Dark Clothes/Armor....

Male and Female Variations available!

Also: Turns some Pieces Invisible
State.Name: Black ReTextures and more

State.Author: LDKSuperDante
State.Description: 400+ pieces of equipment that I ported over better normal maps for. Many enemies and NPCs have better normal maps for their equipment that they share with the player. In short, the player will usually have a squished texture such as 512x256, where an enemy will have 512x512 or higher. I hope this little mod helps out with your Fashion's Dogma!
State.Name: LDK's Armory

State.Author: Lukasborn13
State.Description:
Mod that changes the textures of the hair in game, the original files have 512x512 pixels, this one have 2048x2048 pixels.

i used a little upscaling and some edition that make them looks better.
State.Name: DDDA - MEGAHAIR AND BEARDS 2K

State.Author: Hariwulf
State.Description:
An adaptive, immersive and atmospheric ReShade preset that will enhance the look and feel of this game.

It also happen to be Performance-Friendly.



TAKE MY FIRE!
State.Name: With Fire -ReShade-

State.Author: LDKSuperDante
State.Description: August 4th 2020: Added a much more performance friendly version of the Gransys Environment textures, set to 4k instead of 6k, so it now uses less than half the resources
State.Name: Remastering Dragon's Dogma Sneak Peek 2 - Gransys
